> If you mean that you want to stay on your seeds'=
 domains but include embedded images no matter the domain, your use case is=
 pretty common. In your decide rules (DecideRuleSequence), you will probabl=
y want to include at least the following three rules:
> 1. Start with a  Re=
jectDecideRule to tell the crawler you only want to accept URIs fitting the=
 rules to follow.
> 2. Use a rule such as OnDomainsDecideRule  or SurtPrefi=
xedDecideRule  to accept the URIs from your desired domain set.
> 3. Use a =
TransclusionDecideRule somewhere after the above two rules to allow inclusi=
on of embedded resources such as images.
> 
> If that is not exactly what y=
ou are trying to do, and you need to provide further inclusion of images or=
 exclusion of certain embedded resources, you might do something with a Mat=
chesFilePatternDecideRule to match URIs that are likely to be certain types=
.
